title: Microsoft Acquires AI Startup for $2 Billion
description: Microsoft announced the acquisition of AI company OpenTech for $2 billion in cash and stock, expanding its artificial intelligence capabilities.

title: Google Parent Alphabet Completes Spin-off of Waymo
description: Alphabet Inc. completed the spin-off of its self-driving car division Waymo into a separate publicly-traded company valued at $30 billion.

title: Amazon to Buy Whole Foods in $13.7 Billion Deal
description: Amazon.com announced an agreement to purchase Whole Foods Market for $13.7 billion, marking its largest acquisition to date.
